LISTAR_CABEZERA.sql: SELECT CNM.CPTN_ID AS CON_NOM_ID, CNM.CPTN_DESCRIPCION AS NOVEDADES, CNM.CPTN_ALIAS AS ALIAS, TPC.TPCPT_ID AS TIPO_CONCEPTO_ID FROM CONCEPTOS_DE_NOMINA CNM INNER JOIN TIPO_CONCEPTO TPC ON TPC.TPCPT_ID = CNM.TPCPT_ID

LISTAR_NOVEDAD_DETALLE.sql: SELECT EMP.EMPL_ID AS ID_EMPLEADO, EMP.NUM_DOCUMENTO AS NUMERO_DOCUMENTO, CONCAT( EMP.EMPL_PRIMER_NOMBRE, " ", EMP.EMPLE_SEGUNDO_NOMBRE, " ", EMP.EMPL_PRIMER_APELLIDO, " ", EMP.EMPL_SEGUNDO_APELLIDO ) AS NOMBRE_COMPLETO, C.SALARIO_TOTAL AS SALARIO FROM EMPLEADOS EMP INNER JOIN CONTRATO C ON C.EMPL_ID = EMP.EMPL_ID

LISTAR_CONCEPTO_NOMINA.sql: SELECT CPTN_ID AS ID, CPTN_DESCRIPCION AS DESCRIPCION, TPCPT_ID AS TIPOCONCEPTO_ID FROM CONCEPTOS_DE_NOMINA

LISTAR_EMPLEADO_DETALLE.sql: SELECT E.EMPL_ID AS ID_EMPLEADO, E.NUM_DOCUMENTO AS DOCUMENTO, E.EMPL_PRIMER_NOMBRE AS PRIMER_NOMBRE, E.EMPLE_SEGUNDO_NOMBRE AS SEGUNDO_NOMBRE, E.EMPL_PRIMER_APELLIDO AS PRIMER_APELLIDO, E.EMPL_SEGUNDO_APELLIDO AS SEGUNDO_APELLIDO, CONCAT(E.EMPL_PRIMER_NOMBRE," ",E.EMPLE_SEGUNDO_NOMBRE," ",E.EMPL_PRIMER_APELLIDO," ",E.EMPL_SEGUNDO_APELLIDO) AS NOMBRE_COMPLETO, C.SALARIO_TOTAL AS SALARIO FROM EMPLEADOS E INNER JOIN CONTRATO C ON C.EMPL_ID = E.EMPL_ID

LISTAR_CONCEPTO_MES.sql: SELECT MES_ID AS ID, MES_DESCRIPCION AS DESCRIPCION FROM MESES_DEL_ANO
